name: GOG Galaxy 2.0
notes:
Steps: 
You need to download the Installer on Windows first!
https://www.gogalaxy.com

task.name: winetricks
task.app: d3dcompiler_43 d3dcompiler_47 d3dx9 d3dx10 physx vcrun2015

content:
files:
- galaxy: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win64
  args: null
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/GOG Galaxy/GalaxyClient.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    executable: galaxy
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43 d3dcompiler_47 d3dx9 d3dx10 physx vcrun2015
    arch: win64
    description: Installing needed libraries
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
system:
  env:
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: '1'
    WINEFSYNC: '1'
  reset_desktop: true
  restore_gamma: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
